arts.ttl: Burnley vs. Chelsea: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: The clash at Turf Moor kicks off a four-month run of domestic football.

arts.ttl: Chelsea Predicted Lineup vs. Burnley: Estevao With Another Chance to Shine
arts.sum: The Blues face former player Scott Parker and his Burnley side at Turf Moor.

arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend Predictions - Week 12
arts.sum: Stephen Davies has predictions for all 10 Premier League games coming up this weekend.

arts.ttl: Burnley boss Scott Parker praises 'outstanding' Chelsea figure ahead of Premier League clash
arts.sum: Burnley head coach Scott Parker was full of praise for "outstanding" Enzo Maresca and his Chelsea side ahead of Saturday's Premier League clash. Speaking ahead of the game, Burnley boss Parker is clearly aware of the quality of the squad that Maresca has at his disposal.

arts.ttl: Enzo Fernandez & several Chelsea internationals spotted in training for Burnley trip
arts.sum: Chelsea midfielder Enzo Fernandez and several international players returned to training on Thursday as the Blues continue their preparations for Saturday's trip to Burnley. Several players have also returned to Chelsea's training ground in Cobham from international duty.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca confirms Cole Palmer fracture as Chelsea return vs Burnley, Barcelona & Arsenal ruled out
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca has confirmed that Cole Palmer has fractured his toe after an "accident" at home and will not be available for the next three fixtures. It has been almost six weeks since Maresca confirmed the new expected return date for Palmer, who had been nursing a persistent groin injury since the start of the season.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca confirms triple Chelsea injury boost for Burnley trip
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca has confirmed that three Chelsea players who nursed some injuries during the international break will be available for Saturday's trip to Burnley. The news about Cole Palmer's freak toe injury has unsurprisingly got the most attention, but it has not been all bleak for Chelsea ahead of their return to Premier League action.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca delivers Chelsea team news ahead of Burnley
arts.sum: The England international has been sidelined since September with a groin injury and while the attacker is almost over that issue, a small injury to his toe has set him back slightly and will see him miss our next three games according to Maresca. Enzo Maresca issued an update on the fitness of Cole Palmer ahead of our weekend trip to Burnley, while also confirming the return of a Chelsea defender.

arts.ttl: Premier League reschedules January fixtures for TV picks and UEFA clashes
arts.sum: Key January and February fixtures shift as Sky Sports and TNT Sports lock in broadcast slots, with Forest and Villa clashes moved due to European ties, per Premier League release.
